title: WHIRLING F1 / EUGENE AND ALAIN
description: A dialogue with Eugene and Alain after Titus got killed in the Tribunal

dialogueTree.title: Alain: "The man stares at you with spite in..."
dialogueTree.text: The man stares at you with spite in his eyes.

links.title: You: ""Is he okay?" (Point to Alain.)"
links.text: "Is he okay?" (Point to Alain.)

links.title: Eugene: ""Does he look like he's okay?""
links.text: "Does he look like he's okay?"

links.title: Alain: "He does not. His unshaven face is a..."
links.text: He does not. His unshaven face is almost grey, and he reeks of piss, sweat, and booze.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "While still alive, he has abandoned..."
links.text: While still alive, he has abandoned his own body to decomposition.

links.title: You: ""How badly was he hurt?""
links.text: "How badly was he hurt?"

links.title: Eugene: ""He wasn't, that's the thing." He s..."
links.text: "He wasn't, that's the thing." He sighs heavily. "Titus, Theo, Dennis, Angie... they're all gone, but he got away without a scratch."

links.title: Alain: ""I just..." He seems barely able to..."
links.text: "I just..." He seems barely able to keep his head up. "...there's nothing left. NOTHING!"

links.title: Volition: "He has lost the will to live."
links.text: He has lost the will to live.

links.title: Empathy: "It's survivor's guilt. He feels lik..."
links.text: It's survivor's guilt. He feels like he should have died with the others. He may kill himself if he doesn't find a new purpose -- or else go on in this way, not dead, but not really living either.

links.title: You: "(Whisper.) "What are you suggesting..."
links.text: (Whisper.) "What are you suggesting, Kim?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm not suggesting much. All I'm s..."
links.text: "I'm not suggesting much. All I'm saying is -- he lost everything."

links.title: You: ""Shit is tough but you need to get..."
links.text: "Shit is tough but you need to get off your ass and finish this."

links.title: Alain: "The dull eyes looking back to you f..."
links.text: The dull eyes looking back to you from the narrow face momentarily light up and he mumbles: "What...?"

links.title: You: ""Krenel, Wild Pines... All the peop..."
links.text: "Krenel, Wild Pines... All the people responsible for the deaths of your friends. You're just going to leave it like that?"

links.title: Alain: ""Sons of bitches..." He mumbles som..."
links.text: "Sons of bitches..." He mumbles something in Mesque. When he sinks down on the table again, a malevolent smile spreading across his face.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Was this really the best idea?" Th..."
links.text: "Was this really the best idea?" The lieutenant pauses to think for a moment. "I guess you may have prolonged his existence a bit. If he can still remember this when he sobers up."

links.title: Eugene: ""If you think this will keep him fr..."
links.text: "If you think this will keep him from offin' himself, I'll make sure to remind him... so far I've just been pouring whiskey in him to keep him sedated." He nods.

links.title: You: ""The little guy who ran -- Shanky -..."
links.text: "The little guy who ran -- Shanky -- you're just going to leave it like that?"

links.title: Alain: "His eyes, which remain fixed on you..."
links.text: His eyes, which remain fixed on yours, become somewhat clearer, and he smiles a malevolent drunken smile. "Dennis is a dead man... just doesn't know it yet..."

links.title: You: ""Nothing, just thinking out loud he..."
links.text: "Nothing, just thinking out loud here."

links.title: Alain: "The flicker of light in his eyes go..."
links.text: The flicker of light in his eyes goes out and he collapses back on the table.

links.title: You: ""This is terrible. I don't think I..."
links.text: "This is terrible. I don't think I could go on living after this..."

links.title: Alain: "The eyes looking back to you from t..."
links.text: The eyes looking back to you from the narrow face momentarily light up and his lips move without sound.

links.title: Rhetoric: "He said 'thank you'."
links.text: He said 'thank you'.

links.title: Eugene: ""That shit ain't helping anyone, as..."
links.text: "That shit ain't helping anyone, asshole. The fuck do you want with us anyway?"

links.title: You: ""You'll get over it.""
links.text: "You'll get over it."

links.title: Alain: "The eyes looking back at you from t..."
links.text: The eyes looking back at you from the narrow face are those of a dead man.

links.title: Inland Empire: "He's not gonna get over it."
links.text: He's not gonna get over it.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is a broken man," he whispers..."
links.text: "This is a broken man," he whispers to you. "He probably feels that he should have been able to protect the others somehow. And now he feels guilty for not dying with them, or instead of them."

links.title: Cuno: ""What a fucking pussy..." Cuno whis..."
links.text: "What a fucking pussy..." Cuno whispers.

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I suppose that was a dumb qu..."
links.text: "Yeah, I suppose that was a dumb question."

links.title: Eugene: ""No shit, Mullen.""
links.text: "No shit, Mullen."

links.title: You: ""What's gonna happen to the Hardie..."
links.text: "What's gonna happen to the Hardie boys now that Titus is dead?"

links.title: Alain: ""T... Ti... Tit..." The spit flying..."
links.text: "T... Ti... Tit..." The spit flying out of his mouth is accompanied by a painful grimace. "Tit... Titus's fuckin' dead..."

links.title: Eugene: ""What's gonna happen to the Hardie..."
links.text: "What's gonna happen to the Hardie boys? Look around you, man. This shit is done. There are no more Hardie boys!"

links.title: You: ""You two are just going to go back..."
links.text: "You two are just going to go back to hauling containers in the harbour?"

links.title: Eugene: ""No, man. I don't know... I guess t..."
links.text: "No, man. I don't know... I guess the Union will still be policing the neighbourhood, but..." He looks at his dazed companion. "Who's gonna do it now?"

links.title: You: ""I am.""
links.text: "I am."

links.title: Eugene: ""That wouldn't be funny even if we..."
links.text: "That wouldn't be funny even if we weren't surrounded by the ghosts of our fallen friends."

links.title: You: ""You, Eugene.""
links.text: "You, Eugene."

links.title: Eugene: ""Me? No, man... I'm not a leader."..."
links.text: "Me? No, man... I'm not a leader." He smiles suddenly. "You know Titus only recruited me 'cause I play the guitar? Said the team could use the morale boost."

links.title: Authority: "If *any* of them had leadership cap..."
links.text: If *any* of them had leadership capacity beside Titus, it's him. Keep encouraging him.

links.title: You: ""You can do it. *Eugenie Boys* has..."
links.text: "You can do it. *Eugenie Boys* has quite the ring, doesn't it?"

links.title: Eugene: ""What? Fuck no! *If* I'd stay we'd..."
links.text: "What? Fuck no! *If* I'd stay we'd keep the name to honour Titus."

links.title: You: ""You're right, Eugene Hardie doesn'..."
links.text: "You're right, Eugene Hardie doesn't sound bad either."

links.title: Eugene: ""Man... you have no idea how this w..."
links.text: "Man... you have no idea how this works do you?" He looks at the glass of milk on the table. "But yes... If I don't stick around then it's all over. So I guess I sorta have to now."

links.title: Logic: "He's not a drinker. Another good th..."
links.text: He's not a drinker. Another good thing about him.

links.title: You: ""That's a noble thought. You're goi..."
links.text: "That's a noble thought. You're going to do alright. No one is born to lead."

links.title: Eugene: ""Titus was..." His eyes meet yours...."
links.text: "Titus was..." His eyes meet yours. "But thanks for the vote of confidence. If I don't stick around, it's all over. So I guess sorta I have to now."

links.title: Alain: ""Yeah, man, you know..." He slaps h..."
links.text: "Yeah, man, you know..." He slaps his hand on the table in a sudden burst of drunk enthusiasm. "You know -- you've got this. You got this!"

links.title: Eugene: "He looks off to the side, eyes fill..."
links.text: He looks off to the side, eyes filled with worry. "I haven't *got* shit, Al."

links.title: Volition: "There's something there. A germ of..."
links.text: There's something there. A germ of determination. He knows he has no choice but to rise to the occasion.

links.title: Logic: "This is not *completely* ludicrous...."
links.text: This is not *completely* ludicrous. Him and Titus were the only detectives of the bunch. Titus more, but Eugene at least knew how to think along.

links.title: You: ""Hardie boys without a Hardie? That..."
links.text: "Hardie boys without a Hardie? That's just stupid."

links.title: Eugene: ""Cop, you just don't understand how..."
links.text: "Cop, you just don't understand how things work." He exhales sharply in frustration, but then quickly collects himself.

links.title: Eugene: ""I suppose," he continues, his voic..."
links.text: "I suppose," he continues, his voice now calm, "I should at least consider sticking around. If I'm not here, it's all over."

links.title: You: ""Sounds like you gotta go with Mr...."
links.text: "Sounds like you gotta go with Mr. Outside Hire, then."

links.title: Eugene: ""I ain't gonna stick around for tha..."
links.text: "I ain't gonna stick around for that." He shakes his head resolutely. "I only stayed because of Titus. *There* was a man born to lead."

links.title: You: ""Didn't Titus have a brother? Tibbs?""
links.text: "Didn't Titus have a brother? Tibbs?"

links.title: Eugene: ""Tiberius? He doesn't wanna get mix..."
links.text: "Tiberius? He doesn't wanna get mixed up in our shit. Titus has been buttering him for years on the count of all this being *fun as fuck*."

links.title: Eugene: ""But he's got his window fitting bu..."
links.text: "But he's got his window fitting business, a wife with two kids and the third one on the way... No way he's gonna leave all that."

links.title: You: ""He will." (Point to Alain.) "You j..."
links.text: "He will." (Point to Alain.) "You just need to sober him up, that's all."

links.title: Eugene: ""Let's not get ahead of ourselves."..."
links.text: "Let's not get ahead of ourselves." He frowns. "We'll see what he does with the whole Shanky business."

links.title: Eugene: ""Alain? He won't be leading anythin..."
links.text: "Alain? He won't be leading anything." He turns to his friend. "I mean, look at him -- the man's broken through and through."

links.title: You: ""You should just disband. Let other..."
links.text: "You should just disband. Let other, better people take over."

links.title: Eugene: ""Anyone ever tell you you're a tota..."
links.text: "Anyone ever tell you you're a total dickhead?" His voice is quiet and resigned. "Well... you are, man. Just fuck off and leave us be."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yes. People have called you that be..."
links.text: Yes. People have called you that before. You didn't care.

links.title: You: ""Oh yeah... that makes sense. Never..."
links.text: "Oh yeah... that makes sense. Never mind."

links.title: Eugene: ""Look, what do you want from us, ma..."
links.text: "Look, what do you want from us, man? Things are pretty tough right now."

links.title: You: ""Any idea what happened to Klaasje?""
links.text: "Any idea what happened to Klaasje?"

links.title: Eugene: ""Damn songbird of misery that one....."
links.text: "Damn songbird of misery that one..." The man shakes his head.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And do you have any information on..."
links.text: "And do you have any information on this 'songbird of misery'?"

links.title: Eugene: ""Nah. Garte said she took off some..."
links.text: "Nah. Garte said she took off some time before the firefight, that's all. Trying to remember if there was anything... oh, yeah, he said she seemed to be in real hurry."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "She's gone. Face it."
links.text: She's gone. Face it.

links.title: Volition: "Move on. There's no catching her th..."
links.text: Move on. There's no catching her this time around.

links.title: You: ""And do you have any information on..."
links.text: "And do you have any information on her whereabouts?"

links.title: You: ""Could you guys help me get in to t..."
links.text: "Could you guys help me get in to the harbour?"

links.title: Eugene: ""Couldn't help you even if I wanted..."
links.text: "Couldn't help you even if I wanted to." He shakes his head. "The whole harbour is in lockdown and Evrart sent word to sit tight and wait for instructions."

links.title: You: ""Take care guys." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Take care guys." [Leave.]

links.title: Eugene: ""Yeah, you too. It's a rough world..."
links.text: "Yeah, you too. It's a rough world out there..." He shakes his head. "It's not easy being a cop. We were too hard on you..."

links.title: Eugene: ""...both of you," he turns to the l..."
links.text: "...both of you," he turns to the lieutenant. "We shouldn't have fucked with you like we did. You got between us and a lot of bullets in that fight. Martinaise owes you one."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's kind of you to say." The li..."
links.text: "That's kind of you to say." The lieutenant closes his notes. "Take care of your friend, okay?"

links.title: Eugene: ""I will. You take care of yours," h..."
links.text: "I will. You take care of yours," he nods to you.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "A sharp pain shoots up your side an..."
links.text: A sharp pain shoots up your side and into your stomach. You must not look too good. Luckily it passes...

links.title: Eugene: ""We shouldn't have fucked with you..."
links.text: "We shouldn't have fucked with you like we did. You got between us and a lot of bullets in that fight -- Martinaise owes you one."

links.title: Cuno: ""Hear that, detective Pig? You're a..."
links.text: "Hear that, detective Pig? You're a fuckin' hero now."

links.title: Eugene: ""I wouldn't go that far -- but you..."
links.text: "I wouldn't go that far -- but you have a home here if you need it. And two busted up Union men who are grateful to you. So take care, okay?"

links.title: Empathy: "He really means it."
links.text: He really means it.

dialogueTree.title: Alain: "The man stares at you through the h..."
dialogueTree.text: The man stares at you through the haze in his eyes.

dialogueTree.title: Alain: "Seeing you approach, the bruised ma..."
dialogueTree.text: Seeing you approach, the bruised man clenches his fists.

links.title: Cuno: ""Oh no..." He winces. "You fly solo..."
links.text: "Oh no..." He winces. "You fly solo on this one."

links.title: Cuno: ""Those guys have been going around..."
links.text: "Those guys have been going around town," he continues in a whisper, "Crying about their new asshole. Cuno can't handle this emotional shit when he's off the lightning."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He probably means they've been mour..."
links.text: He probably means they've been mourning their lost friends.

links.title: Eugene: ""Oh, it's you... Didn't think we'd..."
links.text: "Oh, it's you... Didn't think we'd see you walking any time soon." He looks to the man sitting behind him. "Alain, look, it's the killer cop."

links.title: Alain: ""Uh... what?" He looks up, his eyes..."
links.text: "Uh... what?" He looks up, his eyes full of confusion, as if he'd just woken from a deep sleep.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "He's very, *very* drunk."
links.text: He's very, *very* drunk.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Our condolences for your losses,"..."
links.text: "Our condolences for your losses," he says with a little nod, but the remaining Hardie boys don't seem to register his words.

links.title: Eugene: ""Oh, it's you... Didn't think we'd..."
links.text: "Oh, it's you... Didn't think we'd see you walking any time soon." He looks to the man behind him. "Alain, look, it's the rat cop."

links.title: Eugene: ""Oh, it's you... Didn't think we'd..."
links.text: "Oh, it's you... Didn't think we'd see you walking any time soon." He looks to the man sitting behind him. "Alain, look, it's the cowardly cop."

dialogueTree.title: Alain: "Seeing you approach, the bruised ma..."
dialogueTree.text: Seeing you approach, the bruised man raises his beer can in welcome.
